subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Stuart Broad of England became the first bowler to take a Test hat trick — the dismissal of three batsmen on consecutive deliveries — at Trent Bridge in Nottingham during the second Test against India.
snippet: Stuart Broad of England became the first bowler to take a Test hat trick — the dismissal of three batsmen on consecutive deliveries — at Trent Bridge in Nottingham during the second Test against India.
